subject: Re: Need help on running junit from ant
msgSnippet: Hi David,  task works fine with the same jvmargs :( ... java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(URLClassLoader.java:200) ...
messageBody:
Hi David,

<java> task works fine with the same jvmargs :(

--- In junit@yahoogroups.com, David Saff <david@...> wrote:
>
> Voldemar,
>
> If you create a <java> task with the same jvmargs, does the same thing
> happen?
>
> David Saff
>
> On Wed, Jan 14, 2009 at 9:21 AM, voldemar_z <voldemar_z@...> wrote:
>
> > Hi,
> > I catch java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: Network when I run junit task
> > from ant.
> > It happens only when I pass jvm arguments for debugging:
> > <junit failureproperty="test.failed" printsummary="true" fork="yes">
> > <jvmarg value="-Xdebug"/>
> > <jvmarg value="-Xrunjdwp:transport=dt_socket,address...
> > If no jvm arguments defined everything works fine.
> >
> > Thanks!
> >
> > Below is the log of the exception:
> >
